website_summaries.verdict: Design of the pliers ensures they'll fulfill most jobs around the house. Trusted brand name among tool manufacturers.
pros: Excellent gripping power in the teeth of these pliers ensures successful work
Hand grips provide a good and comfortable grip
Three different channel pliers in the set, each of a different size for different jobs
Coating on the pliers prevents problems with rust
cons: Rubber handles on the pliers wear out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Channellock pliers from over 40 years ago. These new ones aren't quite the finish and they have a peened solid rivet holding the two halves instead of a threaded bolt and nut, but otherwise they are as solid and have the same feel and grip as the old pair. I know they have probably cut corners to keep prices competitive, but if these last as long as the old pair they are well worth twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Channellock..... USA made still worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Channellock pliers what can I say they pretty much sell themselves. Same great pliers used for years just needed more and this pack has the major 3 sizes that I just happened to need. USA made so I don’t mind paying a bit extra plus you know they will last forever. Unbelievably quick shipping couldn’t ask for anything better!!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Middleton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The Original and Best Channellock Set...
customer_reviews.text: This is the original, must have channellock set. It should be in every toolbox. If you’re shopping for the man of the house and aren’t sure what to get, even if he has these guaranteed they get misplaced so it’s nice to have a back up set.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool, made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set in 40 years. Lost my previous ones over the years. These guys know how to make a quality tool for professionals. It grips very well compared to other made in china locks
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These pliers are great in every way. Very rugged and the teeth on the jaws do hold up for a long time. I use them for loosening nuts, running EMT conduit, Rigid Conduit, Black Iron Pipe and various other things in my work. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for this type of tool.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had occasion to use all three sizes yet, but the smallest plier worked great for a sprinkler project I had. Excellent quality for the money. Do not go for a cheap knockoff, these are the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: I expected a better quality tool
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. I expected a better quality tool, but not the case. The rubber handles wear easily and slide off the pliers. They grip good, but the adjustable part is a little tempermental.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I am not a tool guy plus I always seem to be losing stuff out in the orchard- so I don't want to spend a lot of $$. These are solid and do the job
customer_reviews.author: Peter D. Himmel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Basically you can’t go wrong with the brand “Channellock”. It’s got quality and name. That’s all I can say. Beat quality over all of these type tools.

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent tools. They are well balanced, easily adjusted, and never slip
customer_reviews.author: pmac

customer_reviews.title: versatile and valuable tools for around the house
customer_reviews.text: In case you've never used these, the "tongue and groove" channellocks are very handy tools. They tackle most jobs that a regular wrench can do, and function well as a pliers. In particular, they are very handy for household plumbing projects, and have all but replaced my need for a standard pipe wrench. The tongue and groove system allows each pliers to have an adaptable jaw size, tailored to whatever you're working on at the time. This 3-pack is an especially good value, because certain jobs are more easily handled by the various different sizes. Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T. Groeschl

customer_reviews.title: like these pliers
customer_reviews.text: like these pliers. I wish the finish was more durable, but the tools are perfect. The shiny clear coat? on these gets worked off pretty easy, but seems to be resistant to corrosion still. I'd buy these again. Might even put a 2nd set in my truck soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Last forever
customer_reviews.text: Just love these , they last forever still have some of my old channel locks that are 20 years old, so I just wanted some new ones. Shouldn't have to buy anymore till I retire.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pliers
customer_reviews.text: I've had some crummy models in the past with nut and bolt pins. Finally got tired of them coming apart on the job. These are cold rivet pins. Really tight at first but are loosening with a little use. Great grip. The handles could have a little more padding, just saying. Profession, electrician - I know my tools.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid, reliable, durable. I own Irwin products as well. Each are good in their own way. These are simple and work well.

customer_reviews.title: Soft steel
customer_reviews.text: I use these pliers on a daily basis in my trade. Steel is not the same as it used to be. Used the twelve inch pair for one job and the teeth were gone. Disappointing would not buy again.

customer_reviews.text: These tongue and groove channel locks worked to satisfaction. However, the larger channel locks kept getting stuck on its widest setting. Other than that I would've given it 4-5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Karatebrain

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: There is no substitute. You need tongue & groove pliers? Then Channellocks are the only option. Try using an off-brand item. At the very best, you'll experience slippage, failure, and a ruined project. At the very worst, you could get hurt. Do not accept imitations. There are certain things for which there are no replacements that are acceptable. When only the best will do: Colt .45, Vise Grips locking pliers by Irwin, Crescent adjustable wrenches, Buck knives, Ford pick-up trucks, Pendleton wool shirts, and Channellock tongue & groove pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Nash Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Standard Channellock quality
customer_reviews.text: No tool box complete without. The Channellocks. Im 25 and finally have the funds to put together a set of real tools. These were among the first on my purchase list (next to USA 3pc Craftsmen Adj wrenches). These are some of he most useful pliers/"makeshift wrenches" on the market. Just within the past few weeks of ownership I have used all 3 of them to rebuild dirt bike carbs, replace brake pads, and disassemble an irrigation pump. Im surprised they dont cost double the amount.

product_meta.title: Channellock GS-3 3 Piece Straight Jaw Tongue and Groove Pliers Set - 12-Inch, 9.5-Inch, 6.5-Inch | Groove Joint Pliers | Laser Heat-Treated 90° Teeth| Forged from High Carbon Steel | Patented Reinforcing Edge Minimizes Stress Breakage | Made in USA
product_meta.description:
Color:Original VersionA convenient assortment of popular CHANNELLOCK tools. A perfect gift for people that know what real work is all about. The CHANNELLOCK Straight Jaw Tongue and Groove Plier is the tool every home and garage needs. This plier is built to last with a PermaLockå¨ fastener to eliminate nut and bolt failure, patented reinforcing edge to minimize stress breakage and right angle, laser heat-treated teeth to provide a better, longer lasting grip.

AMAZON.COM


Versatile, strong, and durable (view larger). The three-piece Channellock GS-3 Tongue and Groove Plier Set is an essential for any garage or DIYer. Channellock's tongue and groove pliers are built to last with a PermaLock fastener to eliminate nut and bolt failure, patented reinforcing edge to minimize stress breakage and right angle, laser heat-treated teeth to provide a better, longer lasting grip. They're versatile, strong, and durable enough to pass down to your kids.

This set includes the 6-1/2-inch 426 plier, 9-1/2-inch 420 plier, and 12-inch 440 plier.

Channellock uses high carbon C1080 steel for superior performance on the job, and an electronic coating for ultimate rust prevention. The straight jaws provide maximum versatility for a number of different applications, and the unique undercut channels provide a stronger more secure grip, that won't slip on the job. They're completed by Channellock's iconic blue handle, which is both comfortable in your hand and easy to spot in your tool bag.

PermaLock fastener eliminates nut and bolt failure (view larger). SPECIFICATIONS
426 420 440 Overall length 6.5 inches 9.5 inches 12 inches Jaw length 0.81 inches 1.12 inches 1.5 inches Joint thickness 0.47-inch 0.47-inch 0.5-inch Handle span 1.69 inches 1.57 inches 1.81 inches Number of adjustments 5 5 7 Jaw capacity 0.87 inches 1.5 inches 2.25 inches Weight 0.37 pounds 0.87 pounds 1.64 pounds ABOUT CHANNELLOCK
Founded in 1886, Channellock is a worldwide leader in the manufacture of high-quality pliers and assorted hand tools. Now run by the fifth generation of the DeArment family, Channellock tools reflect a tradition of dedication to excellence maintained for well over a century. Over the years, Channellock has obtained several patents including one in 1965 for the conical surface created on the cam side of the pliers when undercut and another in 1984 for the PermaLock fastener found in its Tongue and Groove Pliers. Channellock still manufactures more than 120 different sizes and types of pliers and hand tools at its facilities in Meadville, Pennsylvania.

GS-3 TONGUE AND GROOVE PLIER SET, 3-PIECE
AT A GLANCE
 * Includes the 6-1/2-inch 426 plier, 9-1/2-inch 420 plier, and 12-inch 440 plier
 * PermaLock fastener eliminates nut and bolt failure
 * Constructed of high-carbon C1080 steel for superior performance
 * Electronic coating for ultimate rust prevention
 * Patented reinforcing edge minimizes stress breakage
 * Undercut tongue and groove design won't slip
 * Iconic blue handle is comfortable and easy to spot in your tool bag 
 * Iconic blue handle is comfortable and easy to spot in your tool bag 
 * Made in USA


See larger image. 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This set includes the 426- 6.5" , 420 9.5" and the 440- 12" tongue & groove pliers. All of these pliers feature Channellock's patented undercut tongue-and-groove design which assures strongest, no slip jaw action, the patented PermaLock fastener which eliminates nut and bolt failures and the distinctive Channellock Blue comfort grips. Both of these pliers have an electronic coating to prevent rusting.

See more
feature_bullets: Right angle, laser heat-treated teeth grip better and last longer
Undercut tongue & groove design won't slip
Permalock fastener eliminates nut and bolt failure
Patented reinforcing edge minimizes stress breakage
Channellock uses high-carbon steel for superior performance on the job and specially coated for ultimate rust prevention
